document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of Pronouncement''' was a sacred tower located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Tower was located at the entrance into the [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]] in the northcentral part of the city. It was flanked on both sides by the [[Temple of Horus-Re (Skuld)|Temple of Horus-Re]].
document_data.History: The Tower of Pronouncement was used by Mulhorand's God-Kings to make announcements, though this rare occurrence usually only happened once a century.
